long_description: Gluten-free, vegan and protein-rich Keen One Quinoa Organic quinoa can easily be prepared at the campsite or at home to complement your favorite meals. Keen One Quinoa sources organic fair trade quinoa from cooperatives of the Altiplano highlands outside of La Paz, Bolivia. Quinoa is prewashed and par-cooked; can be prepared on a stove top in about 7 - 8 min. or in the microwave in about 4 min. Garden Medley flavor features savory garden flavors. Flavor Country includes a spicy Latin blend. Original flavor is a plain offering of quinoa that you can add to as you like. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Gluten-free, vegan and protein-rich Keen One Quinoa Organic quinoa can easily be prepared at the campsite or at home to complement your favorite meals.
